comments.body: Is it true can anyone confirm
He was a very good chem lab faculty. He was tough on us, but for good reason. Once you got to know him...he was actually chill. RIP sir.

Such sad news!!...
What happened to sir? What is the cause? I feel so sad.
I had him as my chem course professor. He was a legend. He used to frequently tell funny stories and was always chill. RIP sir

May his soul rest in peace but he was not that good of a prof other students make him to be.   
We had him for chem when i was in first year 2 years ago. He was one of the most misogynistic profs I ever met, telling girls that this was our age to get pregnant and everything. Obviously May he rest in peace but i hope to god no other female student suffers by another male faculty the way he made few girls suffer.
Fuck u, may u suffer in hell,

Such a random reddit recommendation notification to receive
Om shanti to sirüôè
